content.3.4 Monitoring Procedure: 5. Attention safety  The scale should be placed on a hard, flat surface for the baby's comfort and safety.  Keep the scale clean to ensure normal work.  Place the baby in the center of the tray, otherwise it might affect the weight accuracy.  Overload (heavier than 25kg) is strictly prohibited. PT. Sinko Prima Alloy 04  To ensure users use the product properly, please read the User Manual 4. Intruksi Pengoperasian  Install the tray / tray on the body of the scale, make sure the position of the screw tray hole is right on the screw hole in the body of the scale.  Install two screws on the tray to lock the tray on the body of the scale, after tightly closing the screw with the rubber cover that has been provided.  Make sure the scale needle shows zero before weighing. If the scale needle is not right at zero then turn the scroll on the back of the scale slowly to the right or left to position the scale needle to zero.

content.1.2 Safety Guidelines: A Warning  avoid exposure to hard objects, moisture, dust, chemicals, liquids, large temperature fluctuations and proximity to heat sources (open flames, radiators).  Repairs can only be done by PT. SINKO PRIMA ALLOY  Cleaning: You can clean the scale with a damp cloth and a little liquid, if needed. Do not immerse the scale in water or rinse it under running water.  Storage: Do not place anything on the scale when not in use.  Strong electromagnetic fields can interfere with the accuracy of your balance.  This scale can accept a maximum load of 25Kg.  Placing the scale on a flat, solid surface is important to ensure that the scale can operate properly. Timbangan bayi mekanik PT. Sinko Prima Alloy 01 Operation Manual 1. Features  Professional body scales, specially designed for health facilities  Material per carbon manganese high quality, high stretch and accuracy.  The 170mm diameter round and large needle display makes it easy to read.  Measuring capacity up to 25kg.  Graduation 50/100 grams.  Commercial grade (accuracy class M3).  Pure and food grade PP material tray.  Sturdy and safe for babies.  The curved tray fits the baby's anatomy and is comfortable.  Non-slip and flexible ruber. Caution: The scroll loop must not exceed one complete loop.  Place the baby on the tray / tray and the reading of the scale is
